alert.note: Alert for Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells; Western Pima County Including Ajo, Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 4:10PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Pima and southwestern Pinal Counties through 445 PM MST... At 409 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hickiwan, or 22 miles east of Ajo, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hickiwan, Charco 27, Ventana and Vaya Chin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells; Western Pima County Including Ajo, Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument
